response.answer_text: The university of fraser valley, canada has a tie up with S.D college, chandigarh where students can study for 2years in India and complete the remaining degree in canada. Thapar university also has a 2+2 program with University of Dublin. Courses - UFV India http://www.thapar.edu/images/pdf/Thapar-Trinity%2022%20prospectus.pdf

Well, you can take the twinning route. Twinning programmes allow you to finish some part of your programme in India and rest abroad. You need to connect with the university to understand if they offer such a course or not.
